name: militarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or involves the armed forces: They are willing to intervene militarily in the affairs of repressive regimes. The country is politically and militarily strong. See
military
More examplesFewer examplesTheir actions could be justified militarily.The two countries are connected economically and militarily.The battle was a great success militarily, but in human terms each loss was deeply felt.

with the use of armed forces: Washington is prepared to intervene militarily if the crisis is not resolved.
